articles.content:
Madonna looked very smooth-faced as she attended the Davis vs Romero fight event for the WBA World Lightweight Championship at the Barclays Center in Brooklyn on Saturday.

articles.title: Legendary Talent Manager George Shapiro Dead at 91 - TMZ
articles.description: George Shapiro -- one of the most famous talent managers of the last century, who repped stars from Jerry Seinfeld to Andy Kaufman not to mention a mega TV producer -- has died.
articles.content:
George Shapiro -- one of the most famous talent managers, who repped stars from Jerry Seinfeld to Andy Kaufman, not to mention a mega TV producer in his own right -- has died.
